content: {"locationId": "6927", "organizationId": "5882", "name": "Putnam County Bread of Life ", "address1": "320 North 5th Street", "address2": "", "city": "Palakta", "state": "FL", "zipCode": "32177", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "29.6499473", "longitude": "-81.6328983", "foodPrograms": "", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Restrooms Available", "aboutUs": "The Bread of Life provides a daily meal to those who are homeless and/or food insecure. We are open Monday through Friday for serving 11:30.  We are happy to make referrals to other resources throughout the county for clothing, temporary work, additional food resources.  Our mission is to serve faith, family and food in a welcoming and dignified setting.  Additionally, we welcome providers, agencies, vendors who offer services to our folks coming for meals, usually on Fridays.  These services include, Goodwill, Celebrate Recovery,  UF Health Street, United Health, Putnam County Health Department, HCA Putnam Community Medical Center, Putnam County Medical Mission, Lee Conlee House, Barbering services, Primerica and more. Basic toiletry items are also provided on Fridays.  The Bread of Life also partners with First Presbyterian Church to offer Showering and Laundry on Thursdays from 1-5 p.m.  Cold Weather sheltering is also available through a partnership with First Presbyterian Church and Westminster Hall at 126 S. 2nd Street, Palatka. ", "notes": "We joyfully receive food or monetary donations at this site.  You may also mail or ship items to 123 S. 2nd Street, Palatka, Florida 32177  Attn: Bread of Life.     For accessing meals, a card will be issued for those needing additional meals.  The volunteers will verify the number needed.  Just be sure to ask a volunteer for your card.   Seating is available beneath the Pavillion and nearby our building.  Meals are served in to-go fashion at this location. ", "contactName": "Kimberly Daley ", "contactPhone": "386-546-3217", "contactEmail": "kdgatorz@yahoo.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 50, "regionName": "Feeding Northeast Florida", "logoBlobNameSmall": "3e48ec97-1083-4266-a50f-f8e9d6c00d47.png", "website": "https://feedingnefl.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Monday 12:30 PM-1:30 PM", "Tuesday 12:30 PM-1:30 PM", "Wednesday 12:30 PM-1:30 PM", "Thursday 12:30 PM-1:30 PM", "Friday 12:30 PM-1:30 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
